name: Adventure Box
summary:
Adventure Box lets anyone create and share their own computer games. Adventure Box 3D voxel games are made and played in the browser so there is no download. The first part of the Beta was released April 24, 2015. The Adventure Box Maker should be complete in the summer of 2015. Playing games published at www.adventurebox.com is free. Making your own games will require buying the Maker for 19,99 USD. It is currently available at preorder for 9,99 USD. The first part of the Beta allows you to:
•	Import your Minecraft world
•	Publish it at www.adventurebox.com
•	Share your world by simple HTML-linking (no downloads required)
•	Get a 3D mini map of your world
•	Embed your world on your own site
•	Design your own character
storyline: Happy Landlord Games are also creating a game of their own using the Adventure Box Maker. This game is called "The rise of an Empire". The game is about you, the hero, a child when the world collapses, as a teenager you begin to learn about your true destiny and what is required to save the world. Game intro available on youtube: https://youtu.be/cT7O4JIOAb4
